Title: The Itch
Plot: The team must treat an agoraphobic who refuses to leave his house, and have to work around Cuddy, who is less than thrilled at having hospital equipment relocated. Meanwhile, House is plagued by an itch, and Cameron and Chase have relationship issues.
GuestStars: Kelly Michaels, Diarra Kilpatrick, Frank Nobel, Phillip James Griffith, Jack J. Bennett, Yoyao Hsueh, Marcus Eley, Todd Louiso, Jennifer Crystal Foley
